name: Tomato-Cucumber Soup With Basil
description: Not quite a gazpacho, because it contains no bread, this is a summer soup that I can keep in the refrigerator and enjoy every day for lunch or dinner.
recipeYield: Four regular servings, or 8 to 12 aperitifs in shot glasses
keywords: appetizer, cucumber, garlic, tomato, healthy, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 long European or 4 Persian cucumbers, peeled and coarsely chopped
2 large garlic cloves, halved, green germs removed
Slivered fresh basil leaves or very small whole basil leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Working in two batches, blend all of the ingredients except the basil leaves in a blender for two minutes or longer until smooth and frothy. Transfer to a bowl or container (a metal bowl is the most efficient for chilling), and chill for at least two hours before eating. Garnish each bowl or glass with slivered or very small whole basil leaves.
